titleStmt.title: Foure sermons viz. I. Sinnes contagion, or the sicknesse of the soule. II. The description of a Christian. III. The blindnesse of a wilfull sinner. IV. A race to heaven. Published by William Ressold, Master of Arts and minister of Gods Word at Debach in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Ressold, William, b. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for George Lathum, at the Bishops head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bishops head in Pauls Church-yard
